articles.content:
Sky Sports will feature two games from  Round Two of the Carabao Cup.

articles.title: The weird and wonderful ways Oleksandr Usyk has trained for Anthony Joshua rematch - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sportsmail have looked at the weird and wonderful training methods Oleksandr Usyk uses. Looking at everything from cold water immersion to sand training...
articles.content:
Oleksandr Usyk is just nine days away from his rematch with Anthony Joshua and the Ukrainian boxer has been training hard behind the scenes.
